text:
Anyone run into this ERROR bug?  I’m unable to save a template because of the following error. However, there is no instance of this module in the template.

Anyone experience this?
Heya <@UA5DFM7CK>, wanna DM me where you're seeing this? I can take a quick look!
Sure Michele. Thanks for the help.
Paging all Firefox users:  I was made aware of a HubSpot cross site scripting vulnerability that seems to only be an issue on firefox.
DM me if you want to see it

Was looking into dynamically rendering out relevant structured ld+json data on each page (Organisation, LocalBusiness, Article, etc). Found an agency that offered a module for this on the marketplace but it was removed by HubSpot. HubSpot is apparently working on a similar solution but there doesn’t seem to be any such functionality currently.. Anyone heard about anything like this that might be coming?
<@U26BLKGE4> <@U3T21PDBK> <@U2H3TT8F2> have any of you been able to map dropdown properties between to the platforms using Zapier?If so how did you setup the Zap to get the field mapping to work?
